comments.author: Tomáš Landovský
comments.text:
This is a multi-line test comment to verify bd comments can handle:
- Complex formatting
- Multiple paragraphs
- Special characters: @#$%^&*()
- Code blocks:
  ```bash
  echo "test"
  ```
- Long content that spans many lines

This would represent a spec or plan document that needs to be passed between stages.
The content includes markdown, code, and various formatting to ensure robustness.

## Section Headers
### Subsections
- Bullet points
- More bullets

1. Numbered lists
2. Second item

> Blockquotes
> Multiple lines

**Bold text** and *italic text* and `inline code`.

End of test content.

title: Fix inter-stage data passing in development workflow
description: Passing data between workflow stages via files consistently fails. Redesign the inter-stage communication mechanism. User proposes using bd task comments/descriptions to store stage outputs. Need analysis of alternatives.

close_reason: Analysis complete. Root cause: planner lacks Write tool; file-based handoff is structurally broken. Recommended: master-as-relay using Task tool return values.
